name: BlackStoneBlock

tasks.longDescription:
With a Seared Drain you can pour melted stuff out of a smeltery.
With a Seared Chute you can put stuff in a smeltery.
With a Seared Duct you can filter your output fluid of a smeltery.
You need to put lava in a Fuel Tank to make your smeltery function.

You can craft a Blackstone Crook with 4 Black Pebble

Use your crook on leaves to get silkworms and also more sapling!

Put your silkworm on leaves and let him infested your all tree, after that you can break those white leaves to get string.
You have all you need to get your cobblestone Generator.
You can get Witchwater by putting water into a barrel on top of mycelium.
This is what you can get with Dust, Gravel and Soul Sand.
This is what you can get with Crushed Endstone, Crushed Sky Stone and Crushed Netherrack.

With a Botany Pot you can grow crops and saplings.

You can have a hopper variant to automate the output, simply put your hopper botany pot on top of a container.

To start, you need to get black pebbles by shift right-clicking on blackstone.

With 4 black pebble you can craft a Blackstone block.

With 4 Blackstone block you can craft your first Blackstone Crafting Station.
To be able to make the Nether Cake you are going to need to make a Soul Sand dough with a Mixer, then compacted it with an egg and sugar, then smoke it !

Now that you have a Baked Soul Sand Cake and a bucket of Nether Icing, use a Spout to put your icing on top of your baked cake !

Don't forget to bring with you an Overworld Cake !
Just visit the Nether

To get Sea Water, simply put water in a barrel on top of sand.

Sea Water can be used to transform Coral Seed into Coral Block.

Now that you have a crafting station, it's time to make some crushing.

You can craft a Blackstone Hammer with 2 blackstone sticks and 2 Blackstone Block.

With that you can crush a Blackstone Block to obtain Black Gravel, keep crushing, and you get Dirt.

To get a flint mesh you need, first, to sieve gravel in a string mesh or craft it with three gravel.
Here's all you can get with gravel in a flint mesh.
Here's all you can get with sand in a flint mesh.
Here's all you can get with dust in a flint mesh.
To make the Nether Icing you need to mix, with a Blaze Burner, a Netherrack, a Nether Agglomeratio and a bucket of Honey.
This is the only new things you can get with an Emerald Mesh.
With the diamond you can make a porcelain doll, which can be craft to get another doll, check out the next quests.
Now that you have a Baked Dirt Cake and a bucket of Overworld Icing, use a Spout to put your icing on top of your baked cake !
You can put your sieve in water to get other stuff from sand !
Grow every crop you can get with your sieving job!
This is what new you can get with Diamond Mesh.
To be able to make the Overworld Cake you are going to need to make a Dirt dough with a Mixer, then compacted it with an egg and sugar, then smoke it !
After killing some shulkers, you can craft shulker box !

You can transform lava in a stone barrel with some dust.

To get Netherrack you need Redstone.

To get Endstone you need Glowstone.

To get Sky Stone you need Sky Stone Dust.
After sieving your dirt and obtain all the pebble, you can craft those to get blocks !

To get Gravel, smash a Cobblestone with your hammer.

To get Sand, smash a Gravel with your hammer.

To get Dust, smash a Sand Block with your hammer.
With Beehive Frame you can craft a Beehive to begin to produce honey.
Simply get logs.
Continuing crushing your dirt to get these seed.

With the Tinker's Anvil you can make advanced tools and weapons.

The Cast Chest is a chest who you can store your cast.

Now that you have a Baked Cobble Cake, just compacted it with Redstone, Diamond, Iron and Gold !

Don't forget to bring with you an Overworld Cake !
Just visit the mining world
The ultimate mesh, you can get a lot more resources with.
To be able to make the Mining World Cake you are going to need to make a Cobble dough with a Mixer, then compacted it with an egg and sugar, then smoke it !

With a Floating Doll you can spawn a Shulker.

To do that, just put the doll in a barrel full of Witchwater.
To make the End Icing you need to mix, with a Blaze Burner, an End Stone, an End Agglomeratio and a bucket of Honey.
To make the Overworld Icing you need to mix, with a Blaze Burner, a Grass Block, a Nature Agglomeratio and a bucket of Honey.
Now that you have string, you need to make a string mesh with a sieve to start sieving dirt.
Grass Seeds can transform dirt into grass and  Ancient Spores can transform dirt into mycelium.

To make water you need a Crucible.

Place saplings or leaves in it to create water.

This is your second step.
You need to put your Seared Smelter on top of your Seared Heater.
Then put any kind of combustible in the Heater and smelt your 3 raw copper to get 4 copper melted.

Finally, pour your melted copper with a faucet in Casting Basin with a Seared Heater inside to obtain a Smeltry Controller (start of the next quest)
To get Clay you need to put a Dust Block in a barrel with Water.

Now that you have a Baked Obsidian Cake and a bucket of End Icing, use a Spout to put your icing on top of your baked cake !

Don't forget to bring with you an Overworld Cake if you want to go back without killing the dragon!
Just visit the end

With your wood you can now make a Barrel to create all kind of things.

For example, you can create dirt with saplings, leaves, silkworms etc...

With a Buzzing Doll you can spawn a Bee.

To do that, just put the doll in a barrel full of Witchwater.

You can spawn a blaze with a Blazing Doll in a barrel full of Lava.

You can spawn an Enderman with a Creeping Doll in a barrel full of Witchwater.

You can spawn a Gardian with a Protecting Doll in a barrel full of Sea Water.

To get Mushroom Block use an Ancient Spores in a barrel with Witchwater.

To get Slime Block use a mushroom in a barrel with Witchwater.

To get Soul Sand use a Sand Block in a barrel with Witchwater.
This is the first step to begin your Tinkers Smeltery !
Produce Honey with your Bee !

Now that you have Bone Meal and Clay you can craft Porcelain Clay to craft a Crucible.

Simply put Crushed Granite, Crushed Andesite, Crushed Diorite or Cobblestone to generate Lava.
Make sure to put a heat source underneath your crucible.
To be able to make the End Cake you are going to need to make an Obsidian dough with a Mixer, then compacted it with an egg and sugar, then smoke it !

description: In this page you're going to find how to play at the start of this pack.
